about_the_game:
This is the winter edition of the already existing Winlu Fantasy Exterior Tileset. All tiles are mostly in the same place in the tileset, so you can convert the Fantasy Exterior Tileset to winter mode with a simple click.

This tileset allows you to build a variety of houses and castles with a wide range of wall textures and windows, as well as roofs to make each of your houses look unique. From a simple house to a castle or a dark tower, everything you need is included!

There are also numerous assets for flora, vegetation and landscapes. Wide meadows, forests and mountains are possible with this package.
With a large selection of flowers, mushrooms and trees, you can create a lot of vegetation variation. Countless animated sprites such as flags, torches, lamps, fireplaces, doors, gates, usable boxes, levers, switches and a water wheel are included in this package, which breathe life into your game.

Features:

* 20 character sheets
* 9 tile sheets


* UPDATE Aug 2024 *

- Complete overhaul to match the updated quality of the Winlu Fantasy Exterior Tileset
- Added diagonal water tiles in characters
- Added animated chimney in characters
- Added animated drawbridge in characters


* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
